sentences.sContent: Much of the country is uninhabitable because it is desert.
sentences.sCn: 由于地处沙漠，这个国家的许多地区不适宜居住。

sentences.sContent: Many houses were so badly damaged in the war that they were made permanently uninhabitable.
sentences.sCn: 很多房屋在战争中严重受损，再也不能居住了。

trans.tranOther: if a place is uninhabitable, it is impossible to live in
